name: CoeWishlistSw6

infos.name: Advanced Merkzettel / Wunschlisten für Shopware 6
infos.description:
Advanced Merkzettel / Wunschlisten für Shopware6

Das Plug-In erweitert den Shopware6 Funktionsumfang mit einer Merkzettel-/Wunschlisten Funktionalität.

Shop-Besucher können Artikel inkl. Anzahl auf eine oder mehrere Merkzettel-/Wunschlisten setzten.

Alle angelegten Listen werden auf einer Übersichtsseite mit den dazugehörigen Artikeln angezeigt.

Der Benutzer kann selbst entscheiden, ob es sich bei der Liste um eine private oder öffentliche Liste handelt.

Private Listen kann nur der Benutzer selbst sehen. Öffentliche Listen können per Link mit Freunden und bekannten geteilt werden.

Alternativ ist auch das teilen über Social-Media Buttons möglich.

Neben dem erstellen/löschen/Umbenennen von Listen existiert auch eine oft nachgefragte import-/export Funktionalität:

Exportiere die Listen, änder sie ab und importier sie wieder.

Jede Liste wird beim einloggen mit dem soeben angemeldeten Nutzer synchronisiert.

Von der Listen-Detailseite aus hat der Benutzer die Möglichkeit Produkte direkt in den Warenkorb zu legen.

Zusätzlich können pro Produkt verfügbarkeits Informationen angezeigt werden

Die Administrations Oberfläche zeigt dir an, welche Nutzer eine Liste haben.

Die Detailseite des Benutzers im Admin bekommt zusätzlich einen neuen Tab- in dem die Listen inkl. Produkte angezeigt werden.


Das Wording (Ob Wunschliste, Merkzettel oder Merkliste) kann bequem in den Textbausteinen angepasst werden

Perfekt für B2B Kunden (Merkzettel) als auch für B2C Kunden (Wunschlisten) geeignet.


Deine Vorteile

Ein noch entspannteres und bequemeres Shoppingerlebnis für Deine Kunden

Steigerung der Conversion Rate

Gehe mit Deinen Aktionen aktiv und individuell auf die Wünsche Deiner Kunden ein.

Schnelle und einfache Auswahl für den Kunden: Was und wie viel soll jetzt in den Warenkorb? Mit einem Klick.

Übersichtliche Verfügbarkeitsanzeige für die Lieblingsprodukte deiner Kunden auf einen Blick


Glücklich mit dem Plugin?

Hinterlasse uns eine Bewertung, damit auch andere User von Deiner Erfahrung profitieren. So können wir unsere Plugins immer auf höchstem Niveau halten.

Plugin Support

Anfragen zum Plugin wickeln wir über das Shopware Ticket System ab. Bitte erstelle ein Ticket über Deinen Shopware Account, damit wir Dir schnellstmöglich helfen können.

Ausführliche Dokumentationen zu unseren Plugins findest Du auf https://docs.codeenterprise.de.

Deine 100% Shopware Agentur

Bei sonstigen Rückfragen oder Feature-Wünschen sind wir gern für Dich da. 

Tel: +49 (0)89 9982 809 44

E-Mail: support@codeenterprise.de
Web: https://www.codeenterprise.de
infos.installationManual:
Zur fehlerfreien Installation des Plugins gehe wie folgt vor

  • Installiere das Plugin über den Plugin Manager.
  • Gehe in die Plug-In Einstellungen und Konfiguriere das Plug-In nach belieben
  • Speicher die Änderungen und leere den Cache
infos.shortDescription: Mehrere Merkzettel/Wunschlisten erstellen und verwalten | Import-Export | Counter Badge | Direkt zum Warenkorb hinzufügen | Übersicht in Admin | Private/Öffentliche Listen| Social share
infos.highlights:
Ein oder mehrere Listen anlegen
Verfügbarkeitsinformationen & Zum Warenkorb hinzufügen aus der Liste heraus
Import / Export Funktion einzelner Listen
Übersichtliche Anzeige in der Administrations Oberfläche
Wechsel zwischen öffentlicher & privater Liste per Klick
infos.features:
Produkte können sowohl vom Listing als auch von der Detailseite zur Liste hinzugefügt werden (konfigurierbar)
Es können mehrere Listen erstellt und verwaltet werden
Dynamische Anzeige im header der zeigt, wieviele Artikel insgesamt auf den Listen sind
Listen können als .CSV Datei exportiert- und importiert werden. Das hinzufügen von Artikel in der .CSV Datei erfolgt über die Produktnummer
Verfügbarkeits- und Lieferinformationen können pro Produkt in der Liste ausgegeben werden (konfigurierbar)
Ein- oder alle Produkte können direkt aus der Liste heraus in den Warenkorb gelegt werden
Setze die Liste per klick auf privat oder öffentlich um anderen Zugriff zu gewähren
Konfiguriere, ob öffentliche Listen von jedem oder nur vom Besitzer bearbeitet werden dürfen
Übersichtliche Anzeige der Listen und deren Artikel in der Administrations Oberfläche
Kompatibel mit dem "Preis für Kundengruppen ausblenden" Plug-In
Session und Nutzer basiert - keine Nutzung des Cookie consent tools

infos.name: Note lists / Wishlists for Shopware6
infos.description:
Note lists / Wishlists for Shopware6

This plugin extends the shopware6 functionality and puts Wishlists into it.

Shop-visitors can add products with the quantity to one or multiple list.

All lists which belongs to the current user will be displayed on an overview page.

From within the overview page, you can manage the lists (create, edit, delete) or add one or more products directly to the shopping-cart (1 click).

In addition this plugin provides an import/export functionality for each list which you can edit and import as .CSV file.

The administration area shows you which user have lists and which products are in them.

Perfect extension for either b2b or b2c customers. The wording (Wishlist, List, Notes, ...) can be adjusted within the translations.

Happy with our plugin?

Leave a rating, so other user will benefit from your experience. Thus we can hold up the high quality of our plugins.

Plugin Support

Requests about the plugin will be handled via the Shopware Ticket System. Please create a ticket via your Shopware account, so we can help you as soon as possible.

You can find detailed documentation about our plugins on https://docs.codeenterprise.de.

Your 100% Shopware agency

If you have any questions or feature requests, don't hesitate to contact us. 
Tel: +49 (0)541 343 714 44
E-Mail: support@codeenterprise.de
Web: https://www.codeenterprise.de
infos.installationManual:
Please follow the installation instructions

  • Install the plugin via the plugin manager.
  • Activate and configure the plugin.
  • Clear the cache


Attention:

In Shopware version > 6.4.10.x an error has crept in, which causes the notepad or the frontend not to work (https://github.com/shopware/platform/issues/2420).

To solve this problem, the following command must be executed in the root directory of the store after the plug-in installation on the server:

bin/build-storefront.sh

The following process may take a few minutes, after that the notepad should work again.
infos.shortDescription: Create and manage multiple wishlists | import-export | counter-badge | add to cart from list | public/private lists | social share | overview in admin | product availability information
infos.highlights:
Create one or more list
Product availability information and add-to-cart from within the list
Import / export functionality of single lists
Convinient display information in the administration
Switch between "public" and "private" lists per single click
infos.features:
Products can be added to the list from within the listing- and/or detail page (configurable)
Create and manage multiple lists. Add products to each list individually.
Dynamic counter badge in the header which show how many products are on the lists in sum
Lists can be exported and imported as .CSV file. You can add products within the CSV file with a productnumber
Product availability and delivery information can be displayed in the lists (configurable)
Add one or more products to the cart directly with a single click
Switch between "public" and "private" lists per single click. A public list grants access to this list for everyone who has the Link.
Decide, whether a public list can be edited by everyone or only be the owner (configurable)
Convinient display information in the administration
Compatible with the "Hide Price for Customer Groups" plugin
Session and customer based - No usage of cookies and the consent tool

comments.text: Schneller und freundlicher Support. Anregungen zur Optimierung werden gut umgesetzt.
comments.headline: Sehr gute Merkzettel/Einkaufslisten Funktionalität

comments.text: Guter und freundlicher Support, schnelle Hilfe bei Problemen.
comments.headline: Empfehlenswert

comments.text:
Das Plugin funktioniert wunderbar und passt zu unseren Bedürfnissen.
Auch wurden kleine Bugs schnell behoben.
comments.headline: Super plugin!

changelog.text: - Shopware 6.5 compatibility
- Fixes a bug that occurs when an unavailable product is in the list, the "add to cart" button throws an error if the products were selected by "select all
- Added possibility to enable/disable SEO URL's
- Increases the compatibility for other 3rd party extensions
The importer does no longer break but rather skip a row in the CSV file, if it contains an error

- Icons on the wishlist adjusted
- Public/Private toggle moved to the right icon bar
- Structural adjustments

- Deactivated products or products that are not assigned to the current sales channel now get the CSS class: is-disabled
- Sales items that are no longer available now get the CSS class: not-available
- Added new print icon of the social bar for the print version
- Fixed an error that articles are not displayed in the wishlist or throw an error if the minimum purchase quantity is larger than the calculated maximum purchase quantity

- Added HTML class for disabled products
- Removed selection-checkbox for disabled products

- Entries in the list are now sorted based on the add date.
- When importing a CSV file, the position of the product in the list can now be set manually.
- A QR code has been added to the print version of the list if it is a public list
- It is now possible to dynamically load the products of a list after the list loaded

- Version compatibility as of 6.4.15.0
- Fixes a bug that when adding manual items, a wrong button text is displayed

- Added SEO URLs for wishlists
- It is now possible to configure whether an additional confirmation is required when deleting a list
- Shopware 6.4.14 compatibility

- Fixes an error in the uninstall routine that caused the plug-in not to be reinstalled once it was uninstalled

- Fixes the bug that in Shopware version >= 6.4.10.x the additional column is not displayed in the administration interface


NOTE: Due to a bug in the shopware core, the current wishlist does NOT work with shopware version 6.4.11.x

- Fixes a bug introduced with the last version that caused the JavaScript not to run
- Fixes an error that the store is no longer accessible if the listId is not set when loading the wish lists
- Changes to the Admin JavaScript so that the plug-in does not collide with other plug-ins when extending the customer view.

- Due to a Shopware bug this version only works with Shopware version 6.4.10.x (issues/2420)

- Added email icon to social share bar
- Bugfix: Fixes a bug that products that are disabled for a sales channel can still be added by entering the SKU
- Performance: Adds a new index to the database to increase the performance

- Fixed a bug that prices are not recalculated when changing the quantity
- Snippets updated to the new Shopware structure
- Added snippets for the confirmation message to delete a list (feature not implemented yet)
- Added an extra HTML-class around the "add to notes"-button for added products. Now you can style your button and icon easily via CSS.

- Added compatibility for the set-article plug-in from Repertus (1.3.x)
- Separate extension can be downloaded from within the shopware store

- Fixes a bug which caused the bubble to display a wrong amount of items in the list
- Fixes a bug which sporadically occured when using PHP8.x
- Fixes a JavaScript bug which caused some parts of the code not being executed correctly
- Fixes a bug which sporadically prevents to display the variant correctly
- Für developers: Added new events
- Für developers: Added new twig-blocks

- Performance improvements
- changed some text-snippets which had wrong translations

- Added an HTML-span element around the checkmark, which symbols the products already in a list.- Fixes a bug within the price calculation which occurs, when a product uses "advanced pricing" and only have one price.-

- New Plug-In configuration: It's now possible to configure whether the page should automatically gets reloaded once a product has been manually added by the SKU
- New Feature: The formular to manually add articles by SKU new checks defined staggerings as well.

- Fixes a bug which prevents the product-detailpage to show the associated product images when the wishlist-modal has been called beforehand with empty cache.

- New feature: Products can now be added to the note-list by manually entering the desired products SKU from within the note-list.

- Adds a new configuration field to the plug-in configuration to define, whether the formular to manually add a product to the list should be shown

- For developers: Adds new blocks to the list.html.twig & content.html.twig to make it even easier to extend
- Shopware 6.4 Compatibility: switched JavaScript components from direct import to the global shopware object (bin/build-administration.sh)
- Changes the JavaScript events from "touchstart" to "click" for mobile devices to prevent accidental executing.
- Fixes an issue within the importer. The issue causes that a new list is created even though there is already a list with the same name.
- Fixes an issue, that the note-list can not be loaded when there is a sold-out clearance product on it

• This Update is not compatible with shopware versions < 6.4.x
  • Plugin is now compatible with shopware 6.4 
  • Bugfix: Products could not be added to the wishlist after filtering/pagination within the listing
  • Bugfix: Checkmarks will now be loaded dynamically (Resolves the caching issue)
  • Bugfix: Sporadical redirect if a product on a list is in a clearance sale
  • Added compatibility for the "Google Tag Manager + Enhanced E-Commerce Tracking" Plug-In from webmatch
- Hotfix: Fixes an issue, that under given circumstances the plug-in could not be activated due to an missing service

- Developers: The default note icon can now be adjusted by overriding the block 'component_wishlist_icon'

- Fixes an issue which occured when adding products out of a private list to the cart. Under given circumstances there was a chance, that a wrong quantity had been added to the cart

- Fixes an issue that an server-error has been thrown while loading the amount of products within a list for the bubble-badge in the header

- The amount of articles within the note-lists will now be obtained with a GET instead of a POST request

- New Configuration: Already added products can now be markes with a checkmark within the product-listing page

- Default list name is now configurable per language with a snippet: coe-wishlist.general.defaultListName

# 1.2.4
- Fixed a bug which occured when placing guest-orders
- Fixed a bug where the counter-badge is stretched all over the page while on an error-page

- Fixed a bug where the counter isn't displayed correctly
- Added title-attribute to the note-icon
- Removed code which isn't in use anymore

- Fixed the error which occures when a customer tries to register

- Fixed a multilingual issue where certain routes whould throw an error

- Added compatibility for Shopware up to 6.3.2.x
- Added translations for FR
- Added translations for NL
- Added a few template blocks
- Fixes a bug which generates wrong frontend routes under given circumstances

- added compatibility for shopware 6.3

- As up from this this version, shopware < 6.3 isn't supported
Fixes a MySQL issue which prevens the plugin to be installed successfully under given circumstances
Initial plugin release
